name: Stroll into Darkness
description:
A free, short visual novel I made from scratch, for NanoReno2019.

I would love to hear what you think about the game. Everything except the engine, are self made assets.

The story is completely linear with minor changes according to the choices. The goal was to provide a minimal horror game that can cause this uncanny strange feeling that can haunt us sometimes. This psychological horror game is not suitable for children or people who might get easily upset.
